case.state: I try not to concern myself with things like enemies or winning and losing, but if I were to fight anyone, I wouldn't lose.
My name is Yoshikage Kira. I wish only for a peaceful life, so I'd suggest not posing a threat to that.
I suppose I have time for a distraction. Deal me in.
No harm in getting a little sidetracked with a quick game.
Dealer, may I have ~cards~ more cards please?
I would like ~cards~ new cards.
~cards~.
If you could pass me ~cards~ new cards, that would be wonderful.
I'd like to request ~cards~ new cards.
~cards~ more will be splendid, thank you.
Dealer, I wish to live a quiet life. It is in your best interest not to disturb that.
Dealer, the cards you deal next may change your life for the worst. I'd advice you deal them very, very carefully...
Dealer, please do not upset me. You may not like what happens.
(All lovely women...perhaps I can find my 49th among these girls?)
(All men!? What am I even doing here then!?)
What a lovely hand... much like a certain someone's...
Is there a hand more beautiful than this one? It feels like I'm on a picnic.
What a lovely hand.
Luck is on the side of Yoshikage Kira.
That is fate.
This is the quiet life I desire.
Just like a picnic.
Yatta!
Bite Za Dusto is invincible!
With a hand this good I will sleep well tonight.
This hand will help me sleep tonight.
Fortune has elected to align itself with Yoshikage Kira.
It looks like fate has decided to side with me once again.
It looks like I won't have to bring out Killer Queen after all.
Perfect. This will keep me in the game.
Wonderful, I won't have to worry anymore.
Have I been pierced by the arrow yet again?
Is this the effect of that arrow?
My fortune is smiling at me, now!
It seems fate has decided to side with Yoshikage Kira.
Much like Sheer Heart Attack, I have no weaknesses!
(All lovely women...perhaps I can find my 49th among these girls?)
(All men!? What am I even doing here then!?)
This is a decent hand.
I prefer more elegant hands...
This hand won't help me reach 49.
These cards don't stand out too much, much like myself.
This hand is alright, if not a bit plain.
I normally prefer a mundane life, but these cards are too bland for even my palate.
I'm certain someone has a worse hand.
This hand is passable.
(I wish I hadn't broken up with my girlfriend so hastily. She could give me some much needed comfort.)
Oh dear...
I was hoping it wouldn't come this far.
I can't afford to slip up...
I may be forced to resort to drastic measures.
It seems that my choices are running thin.
I have already set Bites Za Dusto. If I lose, things will be alright.
I just want to live a quiet life.
I can easily make this work.
I'm safe, for now.
(All lovely women...perhaps I can find my 49th among these girls?)
(All men!? What am I even doing here then!?)
These cards could be better...
This is hand...repulsive.
This is... concerning.
These cards may get in the way of my peaceful sleep... Perhaps it's time to eliminate them...
These cards... Perhaps it is time to use Bites Za Dusto...no, it's too soon.
Dealer... I just want to live a quiet life. I advise you do not get in the way of that.
Impossible! Fate was supposed to be on my side!
Impossible! Bite Za Dusto is invinsible!
Impossible! Sheer Heart Attack has no weaknesses!
Nanda kore?
Shimatta!
Damnit!
Kuso...
Jotaro Kujo must be behind this...somehow.
(It seems I may have to eliminate the dealer.)
It seems these cards may get in the way of my quiet life. They may have to be eliminated.
(Killer Queen has already touched those cards. After this game, the Dealer is in for a surprise.)
Is this the work of an enemy stand?
Is the effect of a stand causing this?
A stand must be causing this...
(No, it's not quite time yet to use Bites Za Dusto...)
What? I was meant to be unstoppable!
What? I had no weaknesses!
What? I was meant to be invincible!
I've no idea what you mean, Meia. I'm not a threat to you or anyone.
I don't know what you are talking about. I'm just a simple man who wishes for a simple life.
It seems it is my turn, now.
There is no need for stress yet. I am still well ahead of the rest of you.
I have no need for stress. I am still doing quite better than the rest of you.
Perhaps I'm growing too careless...
It is fine, I won't lose next time.
Oh dear, perhaps I have been too lax.
This is fine. I am still in the lead.
I am still more dressed than anyone else. I can win this.
Hm... So be it then.
I still have plenty of small things to remove.
Taisetsu na mono wo ubawaresou.
I'm catching up to all of you, which isn't good.
I must maintain my lead...
Shikata ga nai.
I hope this isn't going to become a trend.
Well, I suppose I'll need to finally reveal some skin.
Damn. This isn't going as well as I'd hope.
I'm in the lead, yet I'm still uncomfortably exposed...
This may effect my rest, tonight.
This isn't good...
I don't want to go this far...
I was hoping to avoid this...
I suppose it can't be helped.
I've no idea what you mean, Meia. I'm not a threat to you or anyone.
I don't know what you are talking about. I'm just a simple man who wishes for a simple life.
It seems I must strip.
I do not need to worry yet. It's only my first article of clothing afterall.
This is just the beginning. I do not need to worry just yet.
Perhaps I've underestimated you...
I can still win this. It's only a matter of time.
Understand, I just wish to live a quiet life.
I have nothing to fear. Nothing at all.
I have no reason for stress, after all I still have plenty.
Well then, it seems to be my turn.
I have no reason to be feeling nervous yet. This is fine.
Taisetsu na mono wo ubawaresou.
This is becoming annoying...
Makeru mon ka...
This is bothersome, but I wouldn't have come to this game without being prepared to show something.
Nani?
What? No, I can't lose!
I can't afford to continue losing like this...
Mou dame...
Dammit...this isn't good...
Kuso...
I've no idea what you mean, Meia. I'm not a threat to you or anyone.
I don't know what you are talking about. I'm just a simple man who wishes for a simple life.
It looks like it's my turn.
I'm not doing as well as I'd hope.
I suppose a simple article of clothing will not bring me too much stress...
I just want to live a quiet life.
This isn't good...but I can still come back from this.
So be it then.
Luck was supposed to be on my side!
This isn't good...
I rather liked my socks...
(I'm feeling a little stressed out now...I can't lose this.)
Taisetsu na mono wo ubawaresou.
This isn't good...I can't lose, Killer Queen was meant to be invincible.
Makenai...
Kuso...
I hope I don't lose any sleep over this...
Chikushou!
Shimatta!
I can't lose this game!
Bites Za Dusto is supposed to be invincible!
Killer Queen can't be beaten!
Sheer Heart Attack has no weakness!
Mou dame...
I may have to activate Bites Za Dusto...
Bites Za Dusto... it'll be my last resort.
I suppose this tie doesn't do much to help hide my identity.
(Perhaps wearing a tie with Killer Queen on it is not the best way to hide my identitiy...)
(In hindsight, a custom made tie with Killer Queen on the front is a bit...attention grabbing.)
(Althought the tie bears Killer Queen on the front, I doubt anyone here will notice.)
I have no reason to worry.
It's only my belt. Don't get too excited.
I shall remove my shoes then.
I'll simply remove my shoes. I normally do it whenever I go inside anyhow.
I would like to request someone to fold and put my socks away. I do not wish for them to get dirty.
Is there anywhere I can put my clothing after I finish stripping?
Nichijou ni magirekonda akuma.
This jacket is rather expensive. Even the buttons are custom.
The tailor who made this jacket for me was a kind man. It's a shame...what happened to him.
Keeping yourself in shape is important for your long term health...
I believe it is very important to keep yourself physically fit...
I don't want any risk of health problems that could cause my stress...
(Perhaps it may be time to use my true power...)
I was hoping it wouldn't come to this...
I suppose it can't be helped.
I was hoping to avoid this.
I don't need any intense joys, but I don't want any deep despairs either...
What...whatever could you be talking about?
(He must have a Stand of some kind...I may need to eliminate him...)
Even if you think you know something, what can you possibly do about it?
...Who? Who stops me? Tell me, or I'll destroy you with Killer Queen!
Tell me dammit!
Then you're bluffing afterall! I knew it, I can't be beaten!
No...no that's impossible! You're lying!
SHUTTUP DAMMIT!
And there it goes. Nothing amazing, I know.
I plan on taking my time with undressing.
I am in no rush to undress. It'd be stupid for me to take off anything major now.
I must take care not to dirty my socks.
I don't want my socks to get holes in them or anything, I'd have to throw them out.
I am reminded of a brat who was unaware of how to properly wear his socks.
I actually remember this boy who wore his socks inside out. Idiotic, right?
Please don't let anything get on my jacket.
I only just got a new button put on that jacket, so please don't let it get damaged.
I would hate to get any stains on that jacket, so please put it somewhere safe.
I would hate to wrinkle that jacket, so please put it somewhere safe.
That is why I maintain my physical health.
Thus, I work hard to keep myself in shape.
Therefore, I work out at least once a week, and I do not eat anything too unhealthy.
Beware... Once I use Killer Queen, this will become a very different game.
I am going to set my stand, Killer Queen's, third bomb. That way, I will likely end up resetting this game.
Oh dear, it appears you've seen it.
Now I am fully exposed for you all to see...
(Luckily, I have already prepared Killer Queen's third bomb. If I need to, I can reset this all.)
How boring.
Like I said, if I were to fight, I wouldn't lose to anyone.
I'm growing tired.
I have nothing to gain here.
Try not to wrinkle your clothes needlessly.
Get on with it, it's hardly anything of importance.
I am not interested in seeing you, ~player~, get it over with.
This is pointless.
Useless...
There's nothing for me here.
Try not to needlessly wrinkle your clothes.
How uninteresting.
Get on with it, you're wasting our time.
Don't be bothersome, ~name~. You don't matter that much.
(Those muscles... could he be related to Jotaro...)
(That body... It reminds me of Jotaro...)
(There is no way...perhaps he also has an ability?)
(He could be a threat. If he finds out about Killer Queen, then...)
(Juri would be far too much hassle. Besides, her personality is revolting.)
Not bad.
Hashiridase chase you.
Asu mo chase you.
Dokomademo chase you.
~player~'s turn, hmm? You are quite lovely.
(Could she? Perhaps she could be number 49...)
Muda da...
Good girl. Now strip.
This may sound strange, but could you do me a favor and clip my fingernails?
This is fate.
After this... I'll have to sever ties with you...
Good, good. This is exactly what I want for my peaceful life.
You're finished either way...
Killer Queen's Sheer Heart Attack will absolutely catch its target.
Killer Queen's Bite Za Dusto has already been activated.
Killer Queen has already touched your cards.
Could I see your hands?
My first erection was when I saw the Mona Lisa's hands. Are yours as pretty?
Blue skin? Intangible? Are you a Stand?
Are you a Stand? Where is your user?
A Stand is here? KIRA QWEEN!
Beatrix, you are unlike anyone I have ever seen! What...are you?
(Dammit, a superhero. I can't let her learn my identity.)
Be a good girl and take off the gloves first.
(Faye. I could get away with making her disappear...)
A Persona... Is that similar to a Stand?
(So... Futaba's rather shut in... Would anybody notice if she went missing?)
Don't you think you've kept those gloves on for a bit too long?
Jenetta, your ears are quite intriguing. Are they real?
Jenetta... you are part rabbit? I'm sorry if it sounds rude, but that is fascinating.
I do not mean to sound rude. I am simply in awe that you appear to be half human, half rabbit.
Part rabbit, part person? Is it... possibly a Stand?
Your ears are quite interesting.
(Kimberly has a very tight group of friends. It would not be wise of me to go after her.)
(Curses... I'm playing with a detective?)
(Damn, a detective? She seems brighter than that one other detective, too... What was his name?)
(Launch is a criminal. I am doubtful anyone will look for her...)
(Launch is quite vulgar. Making her disappear would be easy.)
Wouldn't you say it's about time to shed the gloves?
What goes first?
Don't you think that you've had your gloves on for too long now?
A vampire... could you be related to... him?
A vampire... does that mean he's still around?
(It couldn't be...he should be gone, right?)
Mei, you're outfit is probably good for the cold, but it isn't very cold here is it? Why don't you take off your gloves?
A doctor? Reminds me of another person with healing abilities...
Curses, it seems I can't escape from those wretched ghosts no matter where I go.
(I can't explain it, but Monika gives me an odd vibe.)
(I have a feeling Monika has something... maybe a Stand ability?)
(Monika... I feel she may have a Stand ability.)
You would be much cuter if you talked less.
(A girl this loud must not be allowed to survive this game...)
(What a cute, quiet girl... I wonder if people would notice if she went missing...)
(An adorable girl like her...but, people will surely notice her disappearing. Still, her hands look so soft...)
Quiet, aren't you?
Quite the conversationist, Neo.
You look like a maid. Could you obey an order and remove your gloves?
A maid, hmm? Do you do house calls?
So then...
(A journalist? I must...sever ties with her after this game...)
(Pyrrha would be far too risky of a target. She's a household name, and she'd put up too much of a fight.)
(I want to tell her that she'd be much cuter if she talked less...)
Finally, it's time to get rid of those pointless gloves...
(I imagine she'd have...very warm hands.)
(A girl like her... nobody would notice if she went missing...)
(She would be an easy victim. I'll have to approach her after the game is through...)
I wonder how similar genies and stands are...
I normally wouldn't believe in genies...but...
A ghost girl? Why do I feel so uneasy...
A ghost? I...am not sure how I feel about this, anymore.
Why don't you get rid of that camera? It's rude to broadcast those who haven't given their consent.
I do not wish to be on camera, at least obscure my face.
(So... Valerie is a hikikomori? I suppose that means that nobody would notice if she went missing...)
(Her hands appear so soft...and she has no friends. It'll be easy to make her...disappear...)
Firing your rifle in a place like this?
Nani?
You must be using a Stand ability of some kind!
Watch where you are pointing that thing!
Be more careful!
Not bad.
Hashiridase chase you.
Asu mo chase you.
Dokomademo chase you.
If you could just show me your hands for a moment...
If you could just rub your hand on my face...
If I could just feel your fingers between mine...
As I said before, if I were to fight, I wouldn't lose to anyone.
Are you...any good at clipping nails?
How are you at cutting fingernails? Odd question, I know.
Are you single, by any chance?
Kono subarashii...
Like a picnic...
Luck truly is on the side of Yoshikage Kira.
I don't regret joining this game.
This may sound strange, but could you do me a favor and clip my fingernails?
(This is fate. You can't escape the power of Bite Za Dusto.)
This is fate. It is pointless to resist.
This is fate. Resistance? Muda da.
After this... I'll have no choice but to sever ties with you...
Endure the pain.
Itami ni taemasu.
You're finished either way.
Killer Queen's Sheer Heart Attack will absolutely catch its target.
Killer Queen's Bite Za Dusto has already been activated.
Killer Queen has already touched your cards.
Could you rub your hand on my face?
Could I get a taste of your hand? Rero rero...
My first erection was when I saw the Mona Lisa's hands. Are yours as good?
You are boring me, ~name~.
How drab.
How pathetic.
How uesless.
Do you have a death wish?
You have very little to offer, anyways.
I expected nothing, yet am still disappointed.
It seems you also wish to live a quiet life, ~name~.
Do you also wish to live a quiet life, ~name~?
It doesn't matter. I'm only here for the ladies of the Inventory.
Let's just continue the game.
Moving on.
Just get on with it.
Let's move this along.
Most people rid themselves of their gloves first. But I can be a patient man.
About time you shed those, dear.
(She runs an inn... people would know if she went missing.)
(People would know if she disappeared...)
(I can't risk it. Too many people would notice...)
(It's hurtful, knowing you cannot pursue someone...)
(Unfortunately, she is too popular. People will notice she is gone.)
(Damnit... Luck was supposed to be on my side!)
I'm glad you chose to get those out of the way first.
(I cannot risk her telling others of my identity...)
What kind of Stand is this!?
Such large gloves...
Those gloves aren't covering much anyway.
Getting rid of the gloves?
You seem rather strong...
You stream your hands?
I was under the belief that only I had the power to control time...
(I've heard she's the daughter of a famous fighter...)
Nani!?
What the hell!?
What kind of Stand is this!?
This ability...and your appearance...you can't be a Pillarman. Can you?
It's about time those gloves go.
Just take off any small things to let us get a better view of your hands.
Don't be scared now, dear.
Don't be scared.
I'll forgive this if you allow me a better view of your hands.
Removing such small clothes?
I can forgive you for this, dear.
I can forgive you.
I can't stay mad at you.
Mada mada...
I understand wishing to stay decent, but please don't bore me.
I would like this game to progress faster, I have somewhere to be later today.
Do not get in the way of my quiet life, dear.
You can prolong this all you want, ~name~.
You're only delaying fate, dear.
You're only delaying fate, ~name~.
You are only drawing this game out.
If you continue to play with my heart like this ~name~, I may have to resort to drastic measures.
You're teasing me, ~name~. I may grow impatient.
I hope you don't continue to tease me this way.
I pray you don't keep playing with my feelings like this.
Come now, don't keep playing hard to get.
Think more carefully about your actions ~name~.
How much do you value your life, dear ~name~?
How much do you enjoy living, dear ~name~?
How much do you care about life, dear ~name~?
You still have such small things to remove?
You still have small things to get rid of?
You still have small items to take off?
You still have small things to shed?
We're getting closer to getting rid of those pointless gloves.
Your hands are... quite adorable, Dinah.
Cat ears? I do have a rather soft spot for cats.
(How cute...but she'd put up a fight. I can't make her a target...)
Your hands are cute looking, if not a bit too cold...
Your hands are a bit too callous for my liking.
Your hands are quite lovely, Launch.
(Her hands are so dirty and cracked...)
Gloves are pointless, and your hands are beautiful.
Hm... I suppose I'll let it slide this once...
Ah, your hands are so soft looking. May I... feel them?
Why would I get such a sense of dread around a doctor?
(I don't like the feeling of this doctor... I must eliminate her...)
(And I'm almost certain that a girl like her has nobody who will miss her...but do I even want her?)
I understand. I too just want to live a quiet life.
I too prefer silence.
These are the hands of a goddess? So pure...so...beautiful...
(Tch, and her hands are rather nice. I should see about... disposing of her...)
(But that seems like a bad idea...)
(Attempting to confront her will be a bad idea. Her hands seem too callous, anyway...)
Despite how muscular your body is... Your hands seem so delicate... It's beautiful...
Your hands appear so warm...
And I thought I was going to get to see your hands... But you still had that damned suit...
Isn't it better, letting the cold air hit your soft... delicate hands?
It's good to get rid of them. Your hands deserve the spotlight.
Your hands are so gorgeous, honestly.
But your hands look surprisingly gentle...
(Are there others with the same... interests, as me?)
(Maybe I can find streams for my tastes?)
We must have a similar Stand...I cannot let this be.
(If she were to go missing people would be sure to notice...)
(If...Vriska is one of them, then I may not be able to defeat her...)
You have such beautiful hands Yang. I pray you don't allow them to become calloused.
And I thought I was going to get to see your hands... But you still had that damned suit... This will keep me up at night... Perhaps it's time to use Killer Queen...
And now you don't have your ~clothing~ to protect you.
Just be glad I didn't have to use Killer Queen to remove it.
You are lucky that I am a patient man.
So be it. Let's continue the game.
No reason to waste any more time here.
Now, ~name~, are we ready to continue?
(If she continues to bore me I may have Killer Queen touch her ~clothing~...)
Stop messing around...
(Perhaps I should have Killer Queen turn your ~clothing~ into a bomb...)
I'm beginning to lose my patience...
I'm losing my patience, dear.
You shouldn't annoy me too much, ~name~.
If you continue to play like this, I will have Killer Queen turn your ~clothing~ into a bomb...
Not much it seems.
I suppose that answers that...
Well, that's the answer you've chosen.
Could it be... the effect of a Stand?
Could you be... A Stand user?
Is this the work of an enemy Stand?
This must be the work of an enemy Stand.
You must be a Stand user...
This must be the work of your Stand...
I am glad you took your gloves off first... your hands look so soft...
I'd prefer to see someone else take off something.
This doesn't do anything for me.
I'm missing precious sleep for this?
The least you can do is strip quickly and leave.
There is little need to drag this one. Nobody wants to see you, anyway.
I'm getting tired just watching.
I wish I brought my nail clippers, they are getting a tad long.
Let's move on.
Such a boring man. I wouldn't be surprised if you never felt a woman's caress.
(Finally, her gloves will come off.)
This must be a Stand ability!
I think I may have heard of this Stand before. Sex Pistols?
You are calm, you must do this sort of thing often.
Finally, we're getting to something...good.
I've heard that you acomplished several impressive feats in your world Asuna...
I was hoping you would've taken your gloves off first...
(Can Futaba see my Stand? How similar are Personas to Stands? I should keep my guard up...)
(What could Futaba's ability be? Am I already exposed? I'll need to confront her later...)
Good to see you're finally getting out of that silly costume.
It's about time, Juri. I was getting impatient.
Finally. I've been waiting to see what you were so desperately hiding under there...
Getting rid of the gloves first?
You're removing your gloves? How wonderful...
I've heard you are quite the fighter Tifa...
Finally, you're ridding yourself of those uesless gloves.
One step at a time.
You will lose to me.
Fate has chosen me.
It seems luck is still on my side.
It seems fate is still on the side of Yoshikage Kira.
Lady luck is still on my side.
Fortune is still blessing Yoshikage Kira.
Let the joy of love give you an answer.
Let the voice of love take you higher.
I can take you away from this crazy, noisy, bizarre town.
Yare yare daze...
I'm almost naked, and here you are...
Very disappointing ~name~.
I expected more ~name~.
I was hoping for muce more, ~name~.
I'm done with being patient, ~name~.
Damn! I shouldn't have lost this game!
Your hands are...surprisngly smooth looking for a warriors...
(An ability like hers feels too dangerous...)
(I may have to get rid of her quickly...)
(I don't feel safe knowing that she could turn her bullets to me at any moment...)
Finally, those cursed gloves are gone.
How tragic for you that this isn't your world.
(However, in this world nobody will know you're gone.)
So, these are the hands of a princess?
Good girl, removing those gloves so quickly.
But to see the beautiful hands of a princess makes it all worth it.
Does every princess from your world wear gloves, Daisy?
Florina, you're such a cute girl... would you consider becoming my girlfriend?
What beautiful hands you have, Gwendolyne.
As I would expect, they aren't quite my taste. Your hands, that is.
Your hands...what happened to them? Who would let something happen to something so beautiful...
(Her hands are revolting. They...they must be rid from this earth.)
Your hands are oh so very delicate, Kyu.
So you can! Thank you Nugi dear!
Good, I think you'd kept those gloves on for too long, princess.
What interesting hands you have Shego...
But your hands seem so soft...
Despite how muscular you are Tifa, your hands are quite cute.
So these are the hands of a princess? How soft...
Now the game can really begin.
Even though they're charred black, they are still beautiful... I didn't think I'd be using Killer Queen today... But it seems I have to...
This is the greatest high.
The night is still young.
Luck is still on the side of Yoshikage Kira.
This game is progressing smoothly.
I knew Killer Queen was unstoppable.
I knew Sheer Heart Attack had no weakness.
I knew Bite Za Dusto was invincible.
Would you like to get a sandwich with me at St. Gentlemans?
What a great day.
I hope this game continues to progress nicely.
Do better next time.
Please don't bore me again.
How annoying...
If you're just going to shed your ~clothing~, then I shall restart this game.
If you're only going to lose your ~clothing~, then I'm going to use Bite Za Dusto.
If you only wish to remove your ~clothing~, then I shall activate Killer Queen's third bomb.
If you are only going to take your ~clothing~ off, then I shall activate Bite Za Dusto.
It's time! 「BITES ZA DUSTO」!
I think we'll go to St. Gentleman's tomorrow...
I can think of a number of places I'd rather be than here.
Ugh, repulsive.
~name~, must you really be here? It is souring my experience.
I've no interest in this.
I've nothing to gain from this. Move along.
I'm not here to see you, ~name~. Please get it over with.
Let's get this over with.
Get going with it.
Don't waste my precious time.
(He's annoying, perhaps Killer Queen should dispose of him.)
How disappointing.
This is pointless.
I am not interested in men.
I have nothing to gain from seeing you strip.
Why are you even here, ~name~?
I've honestly grown sick of looking at you, ~name~.
You're mere prescence is annoying me now, ~name~.
Just by being here, you are irritating me.
How did I lose to you?
I wonder what we'll get...
But what should I order?
What would I get, though?
What do I feel like having?
I'd prefer something more to my tastes, if you do not mind.
I'd greatly prefer... well, anything but you.
I would be happy with you making your departure now, ~name~,
Let's move along.
Let's get to the real part of this game.
Hurry along now.
Are you done? Good.
Finish quickly, or else.
Are you done now? Finally.
Are you finished?
Muda da.
You're taking away from the enjoyability of this game.
I'd rather not have to look at you.
I don't want to have to see you, ~name~.
You're lucky I don't just eliminate you here and now.
You're lucky Killer Queen refuses to touch even you.
You're just lucky I haven't killed you.
Bite Za Dusto was supposed to be invincible!
This... this is a Stand!
This is the work of a Stand!
Your Stand... it's so... bizarre.
How annoying... Would anybody really miss her?
(Maybe I should just dispose of her as a favor to humanity...)
Finally, I was growing impatient.
I wonder if it's as beautiful as your hands...
What does fate have in store for me today?
(Maybe she will become my 49th...)
If I like what I see, I may make you my new girlfriend.
